title: Welcome
text:
Hi, I’m Riccardo — a PhD student in Agricultural Economics with a special interest in personal finance. This is my academic website where I share my research, teaching, and other professional activities.

I’m currently based in The Netherlands, where I am doing a PhD at the Business Economics group at Wageningen University & Research.

title: About Me
text:
About Me
I’m currently pursuing my PhD in Agricultural Economics. My research focuses on risk management, behavioral economics, and resilience in agri-food systems. I’m also passionate about personal finance and financial decision-making.
